Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.adrain.llm_middleware.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Service implementation for handling User database table operations. This class implements the UserService interface and provides methods for retrieving User data, registering new Users, and fetching the current User from the SecurityContextHolder using AuthenticationFacade.

It uses the UserRepository for database operations, PasswordEncoder for password hashing, and AuthenticationFacade to retrieve the current authenticated User.

See Also:
  • UserService
  • UserRepository
  • PasswordEncoder
  • SecurityContextHolder
  • AuthenticationFacade

      public User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a User by their email address.
      Specified by:
      getUserByEmail in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the User
      Returns:
      the User associated with the given email
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if no User is found with the given email

    • signup

      public void signup(SignupRequest signupRequest)
      Registers a new User based on the passed SignupRequest. This method checks if a User with the given email already exists, encrypts the password, and saves the new User to the database.
      Specified by:
      signup in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      signupRequest - the request containing the user's registration details
      Throws:
      ExistingUserException - if a user with the given email already exists

    • getUserBySecurityContext

      public User getUserBySecurityContext()
      Fetches User from database using email, email is retrieved from the SecurityContextHolder using AuthenticationFacade
      Specified by:
      getUserBySecurityContext in interface UserService
      Returns:
      user User fetched from database
